response.overview: "Celebrate BFF's with the Bratz! Cloe, Sasha, Yasmin and Jade discover that true friends are forever in four super-amazing episodes packed with friendship and fun! From offering up a little constructive criticism when a friend loses her way, to helping a new friend build confidence in herself or realizing it's best to stay true to yourself, the Bratz always put their friends first!"  Episodes Extremely Made-Over Season 2, Episode 1  The Cloe Life Season 2, Episode 2  The Great Melting Pot Season 2, Episode 14  Bye-Bye Burdine Season 2, Episode 13
response.title: Bratz BFF Best Friends Forever
